com.stripe.android

Class Stripe

  • com.stripe.android.Stripe

  • public class Stripe

    Entry-point to the Stripe SDK.

    Supports asynchronous and synchronous methods to access the following Stripe APIs.

    • class PaymentIntent - confirm and retrieve

    • class SetupIntent - confirm and retrieve

    • class PaymentMethod - create

    • class Source - create and retrieve

    • class Token - create tokens for class Card, class BankAccount, PiiTokenParams, and class AccountParams

    See Also:
    class PaymentIntent, class SetupIntent, class PaymentMethod, class Source, class Token, class Card, class BankAccount, class AccountParams

    • Constructor Detail

      • Stripe

        @JvmOverloads
public Stripe(@NotNull
                            android.content.Context context,
                            @NotNull
                            java.lang.String publishableKey,
                            @Nullable
                            java.lang.String stripeAccountId,
                            boolean enableLogging)

        Constructor with publishable key and Stripe Connect account id.

        Parameters:
        context - Activity or application context
        publishableKey - the client's publishable key
        stripeAccountId - optional, the Stripe Connect account id to attach to Stripe API requests
        enableLogging - enable logging in the Stripe and Stripe 3DS2 SDKs; disabled by default.It is recommended to disable logging in production. Logs can be accessed from the command line usingadb logcat -s StripeSdk

    • Method Detail

      • confirmPayment

        @JvmOverloads
 @UiThread
public void confirmPayment(@NotNull
                                                    android.app.Activity activity,
                                                    @NotNull
                                                    ConfirmPaymentIntentParams confirmPaymentIntentParams,
                                                    @Nullable
                                                    java.lang.String stripeAccountId)

        Confirm and, if necessary, authenticate a class PaymentIntent. Used for automatic confirmation flow.

        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity that is launching the payment authentication flow
        confirmPaymentIntentParams - class ConfirmPaymentIntentParams used to confirm theclass PaymentIntent
        stripeAccountId - Optional, the Connect account to associate with this request.By default, will use the Connect account that was used to instantiate the Stripe object, if specified.
        See Also:
        class PaymentIntent, automatic confirmation

        @WorkerThread

 @Nullable
public PaymentIntent retrievePaymentIntentSynchronous(@NotNull
                                                                                              java.lang.String clientSecret,
                                                                                              @Nullable
                                                                                              java.lang.String stripeAccountId)

        Blocking method to retrieve a class PaymentIntent object. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        Parameters:
        clientSecret - the client_secret with which to retrieve the class PaymentIntent

        Returns:
        a class PaymentIntent or null if a problem occurred

      • authenticateSource

        @JvmOverloads
public void authenticateSource(@NotNull
                                             android.app.Activity activity,
                                             @NotNull
                                             Source source,
                                             @Nullable
                                             java.lang.String stripeAccountId)

        Authenticate a class Source that requires user action via a redirect (i.e. Source.flow is Source.SourceFlow.REDIRECT.

        The result of this operation will be returned via Activity#onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)}}

        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity that is launching the class Source authentication flow
        source - the class Source to confirm
        stripeAccountId - Optional, the Connect account to associate with this request.By default, will use the Connect account that was used to instantiate the Stripe object, if specified.
        See Also:
        class Source

 @JvmOverloads

                                                                              SourceParams params,
                                                                              @Nullable
                                                                              java.lang.String idempotencyKey,
                                                                              @Nullable
                                                                              java.lang.String stripeAccountId)

        Blocking method to create a class Source object. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Create a source. POST /v1/sources

        Parameters:
        params - a set of class SourceParams with which to create the source
        idempotencyKey - optional, see Idempotent Requests
        stripeAccountId - Optional, the Connect account to associate with this request.By default, will use the Connect account that was used to instantiate the Stripe object, if specified.
        Returns:
        a class Source, or null if a problem occurred
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        APIException - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers
        See Also:
        class Source, Create a source

                                                                               @Nullable
                                                                               java.lang.String stripeAccountId)

        Blocking method to create a class Token for PII. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Create a PII account token. POST /v1/tokens

        Parameters:
        personalId - the personal ID to use for this token
        idempotencyKey - optional, see Idempotent Requests
        stripeAccountId - Optional, the Connect account to associate with this request.By default, will use the Connect account that was used to instantiate the Stripe object, if specified.
        Returns:
        a class Token that can be used for this card
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        APIException - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers)

      • getAdvancedFraudSignalsEnabled

        public static boolean getAdvancedFraudSignalsEnabled()

        advancedFraudSignalsEnabled determines whether additional device data is sent to Stripe for fraud prevention. By default, this property is set to true.

        Disabling this setting will reduce Stripe's ability to protect your business from fraudulent payments.

        For more details on the information we collect, visit https://stripe.com/docs/disputes/prevention/advanced-fraud-detection

        See Also:
        advancedFraudSignalsEnabled, https://stripe.com/docs/disputes/prevention/advanced-fraud-detection

      • setAdvancedFraudSignalsEnabled

        public static void setAdvancedFraudSignalsEnabled(boolean p)

        advancedFraudSignalsEnabled determines whether additional device data is sent to Stripe for fraud prevention. By default, this property is set to true.

        Disabling this setting will reduce Stripe's ability to protect your business from fraudulent payments.

        For more details on the information we collect, visit https://stripe.com/docs/disputes/prevention/advanced-fraud-detection

        See Also:
        advancedFraudSignalsEnabled, https://stripe.com/docs/disputes/prevention/advanced-fraud-detection
